channel.title: [508] Making a door open with a certain item
channel.description:
Hello, to start off, I am using a bulby source. I was wondering if it is possible to make it so that a door on my 508 server will only open, if a player has a certain item like a key of some sort. Could anybody please post a link to a tutorial, or just at the ery least direct me in the direction of which file(s) I need to edit?
Thanks, Cheeba
